item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Viva Zapata's

Description: "Bartender, the dust of the desert has made me mighty thirsty, quick, my bottle of whiskey!" Just rode into town and need a shot and a beer? Just a shot? Just a beer? A whole lot of both? Or maybe a margarita even, if you don't mind being called a wimp? Then this long-time New Haven watering hole with a Mexican saloon flair is the place for you.

Drink specials are:
Drink specials??! We don't need no drink specials!! It's Viva's!

Food specials: To be announced


Your contact is: Jeanie 860-942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, all are welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour: Viva Zapata's
